Changelog

1.6.5

  • Sendy now works in landscape mode.
  • Maybe fix (workaround) for the \'Error -1\' error.

1.6.1

  • Fix crash while switching to different site.

1.6

  • New design! Travis Allen Tubbs crafted some very cool mockups and he even allowed me to use them. Thank you, Travis!
  • Ability to choose which site you are posting to. Click in the upper right corner of the sendy main screen to get a list of your sites.

1.5.1

  • Fix crash when phone gets rotated while posting data

1.5

  • Support for https. It\'s enabled by default. You can turn it off again via Menu -> Settings
  • Adding pictures from sd card.
  • Display waiting indicator while posting
More information at sendy-app.posterous.com.
Hacked together by Markus Herzog.
Design inspired by (no, wait, it\'s copied from) Travis Allen Tubbs.
